short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple love calculator that calculates compatibility between two people.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Love Calculator Chrome Extension is your go-to tool for discovering the compatibility between you and your partner! This intuitive extension allows you to enter your names and birthdates to instantly calculate your love compatibility percentage.

Featuring a beautifully designed compatibility meter and engaging love quotes, this extension makes checking your relationship's potential a fun and delightful task. With each calculation, enjoy a personalized love quote that reflects your unique bond. Perfect for couples looking to spark joy or friends wanting to have a little fun, the Love Calculator is a must-have in your digital toolkit.

Key Features:

Calculate love compatibility based on names and birthdates.
User-friendly interface for quick and easy input.
Visually appealing compatibility meter that displays results in real-time.
Fresh love quotes with each calculation, adding a personal touch.
Ideal for romantic couples, friends, or anyone curious about their love life.
Download the Love Calculator Chrome Extension today and start your journey into the world of love compatibility!
